response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth to you. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market while maximizing our earnings. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless and personalized experience tailored to your needs. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
